website_summaries.verdict: Recognized for its useful  features and accessories, this versatile product is sure to impress.
pros: Includes 6 microwave-safe and dishwasher-safe containers for portion control, 20-ounce shake cup, pillbox, and ice pack
Box has double insulation for excellent temperature control

customer_reviews.title: 5 star customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product as a christmas gift for my husband. I had an issue with one of the containers that broke the first time i put in the dish washer. I wrote a review about my experience and i was contacted by the seller at that same day apologizing for the bad experience. As a result they sent me a whole new set of containers! Definitely a five star customer service! and the product was definitely worth the price! My husband loved the gift and the ice pack keeps the food cold and fresh the whole day!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie F

customer_reviews.title: Still good after a year and a half of everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and the containers are useful. Update after 1.5 years off use: I have had this lunch kit for almost a year and a half now and it still holds up. I take it to work with me almost everyday and by now expect the wear and tear on both bag and containers to be much much worse - This thing is really good quality. The ice pack started leaking after a few weeks and I could take a start for this, but I wont because I believe I have already received excellent value for my hard earned dollars already. Get this, you wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Great product, perfect sizing for the bag not too ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, perfect sizing for the bag not too big not too small, fits containers other than what comes with it, even holds other shaker cups securely. Wish they had the containers that come with it as a stand alone item, they are good quality. Insulation is good, will keep items cool for at least twelve hours if they're already cool when you place them in it. I can easily get 3 meals, an apple and a couple tablespoons of peanut butter in it, and I'm on a 650 calorie per meal diet.
customer_reviews.author: onyxscarab

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty good setup!
customer_reviews.text: So I liked all of the extras that come with this -but they are not that great quality. The shaker bottle does not work well and I will probably just use mine. The containers while they seemed like a good idea give limited options -so I ended up getting other containers to put in the bag. I think if I had just focused on the bag I may have picked something else -but overall I am happy with the purchase and it will be useful.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent. You will love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this lunch bag. Nothing was missing when we unpacked it. The size is perfect. The design is beautiful. You can fit plenty of food, fruits or cans in this bag. My husband been using it for well over a year and has no issues at all. It comes with a shoulder strap and a cooling pack. The added Tupperware is a bit small in size but we just use it for other things around the kitchen. You will love this lunch bag. Money very well spent and would definitely order again if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Shell Gr

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 2 extra sets of these containers. The best I have experienced so far!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 extra sets of these containers. The best I have experienced so far! I have dropped them, thrown my bag around while they are in my bag, Excessively hot food doesnt permanently morph the containers or cause them to bust open from pressure. If anything changes I'll change my post but I have had these over a month and bought extra for freezing extra food I make. Still has not failed me. I will recommend these to anyone and everyone. This is a quality product. Also these work as dog food ON-THE-GO containers for hiking or just storage when traveling (which I do a lot of). Small, compact, durable and very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Not enough Space
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this bag for 4 months, It's a Sturdy bag, the containers included are sturdy and leak proof. Good for small portion size. As a Flight Attendant who bought it for multiple overnight trips; I'm giving it a 3 because I am slightly disappointed at how much I struggle fitting enough meals for 2 days. This is a nice bag for a day, at most a 2 day trip, any longer than that and it's no good in capacity. Good quality, just not what I needed unfortunately. If you need a bag to just get by through the day, it's good. If you need it for multiple day trips, don't get it.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador Benitez Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good little lunch box. The containers are decent quality. With all six containers in the box there is no more space, so I use three containers on one side so I can fit 3-4 bottles of water on the other side. The zippered pocket on the side are good for putting your random items such as keys, and the “supplement pill” dispenser. Just don’t fill it with Vicodin and Xanax. You’ll get arrested. Overall it’s a good lunch box, not bulky, and much smaller in purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality for a Comfortable Price
customer_reviews.text: I was ABSOLUTELY THRILLED, when I opened box and saw my Thinkfit. Never expected all items to be such top quality for small cost of Thinkfit. Bag is perfect size for anyone to carry, but Very lightweight for the top quality material. You get lots of containers and they are better quality than ones I bought from Tupperware. Only thing missing is quality plastic camp spoon, fork, & knife. Otherwise they thought this set out, PERFECTLY. I use mine for work, hot breakfast, midday snack, & lunch. Also great for Off-road trips in Jeep. I would give 10 stars if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Duchess Harbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Cooling pack leaked.
customer_reviews.text: Update/ resolution- The company reached out to me after I let them know the issues I had. They are willing to refund or replace the product. They are very accommodating and really seem to be backing their product and word. Nice to see a company willing to do that for their customers. Disappointed. It arrived yesterday and just unpacking it from the box this morning... the cooling pack liquid had leaked everywhere. Noticed a loose string that is concerning, and I wonder if it will unravel in the future as other reviews have noted this as a problem. The rest of the construction of the case looks to be solid and appears to be intact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was so excited for this bag for my new meal ...
customer_reviews.text: Update.... fix didn’t last 5 minutes I will be returning it. Was so excited for this bag for my new meal planning adventure and it came with a messed up zipper I was able to get it on track but not sure how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Tennyson

customer_reviews.title: I love the containers
customer_reviews.text: I love the containers, in fact I bought another set. I love the metal coil in the mixer cup as it's really good at breaking up clumps in my protein powder and doesn't get lost in the dishwasher as it's attached. The pill sorter was so good I bought a few more. The ice pack is fine, unremarkable. The bag itself however was a total waste. It didn't keep my food cold at all despite MULTIPLE, like 4-5, ice packs- I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Irish OLeary

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT, WELL MADE!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these, one for my husband and myself. There were a few things missing but I contacted the company and they replied within minutes. This is what I loved about this company... they answered, apologized, and sent me a link to track my package immediately. The material on the bag itself is sturdy and I tested out the containers and they are 100% leak proof. If a great product is what you need I 100% recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: All you need in one place!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. One would think that it’s too small by looking at the pictures or reading the reviews. However, the portion sizes are good and I can fit a lot in the bag. I don’t think it’s too small, it’s actually a good size. I purchased extra ice packs to wedge in between some containers, which I recommend if you keep the food all day.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch box for meal prep!
customer_reviews.text: The lunch box is light-weight and easy to carry and comes with an ice pack which is convenient for keeping things cold. The only negative may be that the containers themselves are a little small but since I am prepping not using them all, only 4 of the 6. Only take a breakfast, lunch and snacks so if I did need to bring my evening meal I would have the remaining 2 containers to bring it in. Works for me my last container had the hard plastic liner and it was awkward and bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost
customer_reviews.text: Just to be clear, I will use this as my lunch box until it falls to pieces, or I lose it...sometimes that happens. This is what I have been looking for for a while. All the right containers, size of the containers, the cup and its attachments are super cool. My only qualm is the fact that it does not keep things cool or warm very long. I get so excited by this item until I check the weather and it is going to be a hot one. Almost...
customer_reviews.author: Prometheus Twain

customer_reviews.title: Total game changer for meal planning!
customer_reviews.text: I am a busy endurance athlete who has always struggled with the timing of my meals and nutrition. I found this gem and can now take the appropriate amount of meals with me to the office. Not only am I saving money on sub par cafeteria lunches, but with this kit I am now able to easily pack the right portions, meals, and snacks and eat at the proper times of day. The ice packs keep my meals cool so I don’t even have to use the community office fridge. I highly recommend this product for busy health conscious people. And the customer service is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great bag and worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is one of the best things I have bought in a while. Keeps things cold and hot, also cleaning it is very easy. This bag is worth the money 100% especially since I use it for my meals. A few people saw this bag and bought it for themselves. Keeps my meals cold and easy to carry and not bulky at all. I am shocked how much you can put in it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meal planning junkies
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lunch pale for meal planners like my self. I went through 7 different brands and I love this one the most. I did not get my shaker cup and emailed the customer service people and they actually just refunded me the whole amount even though I just wanted the cup that was super nice so I plan on purchasing another bag for my boyfriend. Thank you guys for making my experience with a missing item pretty easy!
customer_reviews.author: Porsha

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag with extra goodies.
customer_reviews.text: I actually just wanted the bad itself. The fact that it came with everything else made it that much better. You can fit about 3-4 meal storage containers and there still some wiggle room for fruits. I dont use the water bottle it came with for its intended use. the spring itself doesnt look like it would be good to break down my whey protein. I'm satisfied the the spiral ball from my other bottle. If i do decide to use the mechanism that the bottom came with, i will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: BigTangTheory

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and design.
customer_reviews.text: The lunch bag and containers are very well built and seem like they will last a long time. The container lids seal up well and do not leak or bend after running them through the dish washer. The water bottle holder on the side of the bag is large enough to easily fit large 1L bottles and the opposite side pocket is great for storing vitamins with the included vitamin dispenser. The ice packs do not leak and the bag keeps my meals cool throughout the day. Great purchase and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: My versatile everything lunch bag.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunch bag. It gives me the flexibility to have it with me and not struggle to find my lunch in the refrigerator at work. It has the right amount of containers and size. The refreezable ice that fits between containers keeps everything fresh and cold. Great insulation in bag itself. I love the shaker bottle that has a place for putting protein powder and allows me a spot to also add extras to my shake. The side pocket with pill container gives me room to put my spoon and fork. I love the pill container. So easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Marie D Garcia

customer_reviews.title: To small if you're eating to bodybuild
customer_reviews.text: Way too small if you eat a lot due to bodybuilding and high calorie requirements. If you eat like a bird all day, this size of cooler will work just fine. I had to return it due to its small size; no other reason. It seems to be built well but it was just too small for my particular needs. The break-down shaker bottle was pretty cool as well as the supplement dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Grizz

customer_reviews.title: But me!!
customer_reviews.text: Great size with ice in the middle so you don’t have to refrigerate your lunch box at work. Then! There is a shaker with a cup that is under a cup to keep you shake powder dry. Then! There are compartments on top of the cups that could hold like, cinnamon, separated into 3 small compartments. All sitting in a nice shaker waiting for activation. The containers are small but this will keep me in line. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: This thing rocks!
customer_reviews.text: My buddy and I bought two different lunch boxes to compare. He bought a bigger, twice as expensive, bag. Both of our bags maintained the cold inside, but this back allows six containers. It also comes with an ice pack, and a pill container. After several weeks of comparing, he went out and bought one of these too!. They are great. The only draw back is the drink holder on the side. Other brands have an option where the drink holders are insulated also. But dollar for dollar, this is absolutely the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Gabi

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who is always on an adventure of which diet he wants to do for the week... LOL. The containers are quite small. So if you’re like my husband who is trying to bulk up, these containers are a no-go for you. If you’re trying portion control, these will be your best friends. Overall the product is great, only downside is the size of the containers. I thought they would be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: GLAM

customer_reviews.title: Great product, made well, lasts long. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this cooler it has stayed in the same great condition that it came in. As an avid gym rat, I use the mixer bottle DAILY. The different compartments allow you to put your pre-workout in one, and your post-workout/protein powder in the other. It's a perfect duo. The stackable containers make it very easier to do meal portio control and that in and of itself influences me to pack my own lunch, which I do now. The ice pack does stay cold all day. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: WBell

customer_reviews.title: Everything a lunch box should be
customer_reviews.text: Got this because my lunch kept getting stolen at work and I no longer use the shared fridge. The ice pack 100% keeps everything super cold throughout the day. The portion control boxes are smallish, but I can fit bigger leftover boxes for lunch with ease due the massive amount of space in the lunchbox. The shaker bottle is spot on and easy to clean. Shipping was way quicker than anticipated. Overall 10/10 experience, and I've already gotten compliments on it. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JBL

customer_reviews.title: ... had the item about a week now it works great up until today i tried to seal two out ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok so i have had the item about a week now it works great up until today i tried to seal two out of the 6 bowls shut and one side keeps coming up and wont stay closed on that side other than that i love this product the bowls can made a little stronger though.
customer_reviews.author: suki

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a lot less $$!
customer_reviews.text: I work 24 hour shifts at the fire department, with no idea when the next call is coming, it’s real easy to just grab whatever you can eat. Usually I end up eating snacks and delivery with no idea how many calories I’m putting down. This lunchbox is the perfect way to pre-plan my meals. Initially I was concerned about having enough for the whole shift, but I almost have too much! The construction quality is excellent, I expect it to hold up well. The bins appear to be a standard size, so replacement shouldn’t be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for first responders
customer_reviews.text: I just received this in the mail yesterday. I work in healthcare and during this pandemic, my hours and days are long. This meal prep tote is amazing! I am able to store all my food and keep it cool. 2 of my coworkers already purchased this for themselves. I HIGHLY recommend. I will be ordering another one for my wife :).
customer_reviews.author: D Champion

customer_reviews.title: Best lunch box ever
customer_reviews.text: My husband has tried so many ways to take lunch to work. So far this is his favorite! The containers are perfect size and all fit perfectly in the bag. The zipper is super easy to open and see all the containers. You don't have to struggle to get to the bottom container like a usual bag that has a top opening. Plus the it comes with an ice pack! I am happy he now has specific containers that fit his lunch bag, instead of having to struggle finding other containers and try to make them fit...specially if they are different sizes. Definitely happy we purchased!
customer_reviews.author: z_gar.z.a

customer_reviews.title: Enough capacity and good service.
customer_reviews.text: I gave five stars to them because they provide a perfect service. For the products, I would say it is okay. The zip is too cheap and was so hard to close or open it until I wipe a bit wax on it. It is good to keep food cool if you put extra cooler bar on the side. The medication container is quiet useless because it could only fit 1 fish oil capsule and 1 vitamin C, and the spring in the center is easily stucked.
customer_reviews.author: Troy You

customer_reviews.title: Spacious
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my boyfriend and he loves it. He takes a lot of food to work and it all fits perfectly. He doesn't use the containers but likes the shaker bottle. Great purchase if you need to carry a couple of meals with you.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical on buying these bags but we brought two. They are perfect for our meal prepping and portion control! I love that everything is easily transportable and works perfectly while I'm coaching in the gym. The shaker cup that comes with the bag is perfect as well. Only thing I would change is, I wish the shaker cup didn't ship already on the side cup pouch. It stretches out the pouch. I rather the cup be shipped inside the bag therefore I have more options of the different size shakers I want to use with the bag and still feel secure that it will stay put. Other than that I love the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Kizzle Kay

customer_reviews.title: Best value ever!
customer_reviews.text: Im very surprised in the quality for how cheap this was comparatively speaking. Im very happy with this purchase! I had a chocolate milk open up inside and I would have never known this happened until I opened the bag! Talk about Leak Proof! The prep containers are great too!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Lundquist

customer_reviews.title: Came ripped
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like this but it came ripped out of the box, very thin material used so I would guess this is prone to this type of failure.
customer_reviews.author: ZDOT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My work place put on a Journey to Health fitness program this year. I found this lunch bag on line, and had to try it out. Ended up buying one for me, and my wife. They are the perfect size for the portions my health coach has set up for me. Needless to say, our Safety Dept. now wants to buy some of these, and give them out as safety awards. Great product. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: james free

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! It's lightweight, medium to small containers for portion control, two pill containers (in shaker and circular container), has dual compartment shaker, and an Ice pack. It has a side pocket that I stash small treats in. I have been using it everyday and have been thoroughly satisfied. It's helped me consistently eat smaller portions throughout the day. For everything you get and the inexpensive price, it's well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: KimchiDumpling

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch bag for meal prep
customer_reviews.text: Overall great quality and very happy with my purchase. The lid to the vitamin case was cracked and they sent me a new case. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty glad that I wound up purchasing this over a regular lunchbox. I love how much you can fit in it, the styling, and the side pouch for extra things + the drink holder. I've been using grocery bags for quite a while and felt guilty about how much I was using so this is a nice change. As a bonus, i've been complimented at least 2-3 times on this product while taking it out in the breakroom lol!
customer_reviews.author: Pam (Chicago)

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Happy
customer_reviews.text: My husband works 3rd shift therefore he has to take his dinner to work. A co-worker has the same lunchbox and had been very pleased with his so we decided to buy him one as a Christmas present. He really likes the sturdy handle and a strap. He likes the way it opens up on the side to show all of the containers. I like the way the containers fit in the lunchbox and the closure. So far we are extremely happy with our purchase. I mostly like the quick delivery-reasonable price and super customer service email from the company. We couldn't ask for more. May God Bless their business
customer_reviews.author: PR3

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: It is well made and sturdy. Zippers are good quality. Containers are plastic. Not much storage on the outside. But enough to get by with. Not much extra room on the inside to put much in the inside pocket. But again, it's enough for untiencils condiment packets and napkins.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler1226

customer_reviews.title: Value of money is good
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t leak and this is great, bag material is great and looks so good But •Portion size for me would be better if it gets bigger as this is too tiny for salad & small for the needed protein portion for someone working out • the bills case for damaged after 3 days of using it like we can’t press the button to turn to the next bill case. We need to open the whole transparent cap.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvana Ghobrial

customer_reviews.title: ThinkFirst then ThinkFit
customer_reviews.text: After looking at a number of meal transport carriers, with price and quality in mind, I found ThinkFit to be the best for the purpose I intend to use it for. Fantastic carry/on if your traveling with kids. It was a bonus to receive the excellent customer service from day one. Bill H~~~Gig Harbor, WA
customer_reviews.author: W. P. H.

customer_reviews.title: The best. Period
customer_reviews.text: Considering Isolator bags cost more than twice, there is no competition for the ThinkFit bag. Resistant, beautiful, practical, with an amazing blender and lunch boxes to spare. The Pill box compartments should be bigger, as any bodybuilding/fitness athlete will probably use BCAA's which do not fit, but I do not think it is enough of a big deal to lower its score.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag. I’ve had zero problems with it. It holds a lot more than you think it would and it doesn’t look extremely big. Great gift for someone or just for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: graciekins85

customer_reviews.title: 4 large & 2 small containers good size and I like the snap sides to prevent leakage.
customer_reviews.text: I like the rectangular design of the carrying case because it will fit nicely in the refrigerator at work. I can also keep individual units in work fridge, but the ice pack is large enough that refrigeration is not necessary. There are enough containers to get me through an entire day plus shake bottle. Nice arm strap - some models only have handles.
customer_reviews.author: Laura T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice lunch box for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for about one week, but so far it has held up and I have had no issues. The only thing I would think about changing is the carry strap hooks get in the way of using the side pockets. Not a big deal as I just work around it. My lunch has stayed cool for 6 hours (time I pack until lunch). The case seems really strong and heavy duty. I have had other name brands of lunch boxes and this seems just as good for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T. Grifo

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: Great lunch bag. I needed something spacious but not as big as a duffel bag for work. This thing is great. Good price and the containers that come with a great bonus. I use my gladeware and their containers depending on what I bring. Plenty of space inside. I like the cup holder on the side. Keeps another hand free when going to and from. The rotating pill holder is oddly satisfying to click around and another great perk. My maintenance medication and multivitamin is always ready when I need it. Oh, and the shaker bottle is great for the gym. Sleek design allows you to take your whole stack without wasting any space. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lester C. Nowak

customer_reviews.title: incredible value quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I'm able to carry my breakfast, lunch and preworkout meal. The beverage carrier is perfect for the included shaker and even my coffee tumbler. when i don't use the provided containers, it still fits several entree size plastic containers. Never had a problem that it didn't hold at least 3 meals. supplement container is also a plus. the shaker is leak proof as well. great value and I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: badgerbobby

customer_reviews.title: An excellent meal bag for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag during a flash sale for $27 and I am very happy with my purchase.The bag is very sleek and compact,perfect for work or travel. The pack in containers seem to be durable and fit inside the bag nicely. It also comes with a nice shaker cup and pill dispenser. My only real complaints are about the lack of a second cup/bottle holder for a water bottle,the bag is also a little smaller in person than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: DFury

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the ThinkFit to meal prep for my overnight shifts at work. Being in Law Enforcement, I don't always get the opportunity to stop and eat the amount of meals needed to stay in an anabolic state after workouts. The ThinkFit comes with plenty of storage containers for portioning out food and snacks and stays cold throughout my 12 hour shift. The pill dispenser and shaker bottle are a great addition and the screw on containers are great for storing things like proteins or other supplements. Overall very satisfied and would highly recommend for those that are looking to meal prep.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E

customer_reviews.title: Well made and designed
customer_reviews.text: I have used twice so far and I love the number of pockets and overall design. The 2 ice packs provided help keep my food cold without issues. The small containers help keep portions under control as I look to lose a couple pounds. Overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality, great bag not to big and not to small. This bag was made for food preparation. Package great for shipping. Not like many bags that come smash down then you have to try to get it to shape. I will definitely put the word out to all my work out food prepping team
customer_reviews.author: Irving

customer_reviews.title: Great for meal prepping
customer_reviews.text: I received a ThinkFit lunchbox for Christmas. I meal prep my lunches each week, so I have been using the containers and lunchbox to store my portioned meals for each day. I really liked the way it fits in my refrigerator so conveniently, and the containers are good quality. The shaker bottle is awesome as well. I like the way it has the different compartments. I loved the lunchbox so much that I bought the same thing for my boyfriend, who also meal preps. This seems like a good system for people who prep six meals a day for bodybuilding and for people who just prep their work lunches for the week to save time.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Demetros

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: a little on the small side but if your using for work etc does great and good quality, mines lasted a while now
customer_reviews.author: christian romero

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient, Comfortable, and Quality for indoor jobs/events.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunch box for meal prepping. I am able to fit my shaker cup, snacks, and lunch in comfortably. I found the meal prepping containers to be a bit small, and the insulation is not as good as most coolers. I definitely have to use both Ice packs to keep the box cold throughout the day. There is room for keys, wallet etc. which makes it easy for most office duties/indoor jobs. Definitely would not recommend for people that work outside, the external material is not sturdy and would not stay cold long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Meg L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I am just starting to get into the "healthy" living lifestyle more than usual and wanted something to bring all of my food and snacks to work in. I am plan on trying to compete in some competitions later on so I thought I would go ahead and buy something will work for that as well. This is the PERFECT size. The containers are small which is PERFECT for portion control and the ice pack actually stays cold most of the day. I had it in the bag for almost 10 hours yesterday and it was still slushy when I got home. I am very pleased with this bag and the containers.
customer_reviews.author: Rae B

customer_reviews.title: thinkfit lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: awesome just awesome and the price is great, for a little bag it holds a lot of stuff you will be amazed. I am now using it everyday, Awesome job ThinkFit, I will be glad to tell all the people I know that are looking for a good lunch box and don't want to spend on an over priced one just because of the name.
customer_reviews.author: James Parris

customer_reviews.title: Solid value
customer_reviews.text: I am a patrol officer and use this for work. Does everything I need it to do. I appreciate the moderately sized Tupperware to help maintain portion control. I practice intermittent fasting and this is a great product that helps with that. One complaint I have is the size and quality of the ice pack. It's too small and it also burst open on me after only a couple months use. It wasn't dropped or anything.. Just sporadically burst open. If it weren't for this I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: LimFu

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than you think.
customer_reviews.text: The containers are unusable unless your a 100 lb female that eats tiny meals or for a 10 year old kid. I use the bag and had to go buy all new larger meal prep containers...im able to fit 3 containers in the bag. Each container has 6-10 oz of beef or chicken with half cup of rice.
customer_reviews.author: IS

customer_reviews.title: The Containers are Fragile
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about the cooler itself but rather the containers. I prepped and packed my meals the night before then placed the containers in the refrigerator. The next morning I dropped one of the large containers which landed on it's corner when it hit the floor. The corner of the container broke out and now it is useless. Buyers should also beware the containers do not nest together when stacked with the lids on. Be careful not to stack them except in the cooler as you too may break one.
customer_reviews.author: Stoich

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Design
customer_reviews.text: Nice design. Works perfectly for me. I can have many different type of food all in locked leak proof. In the same time I can carry my bottles and pills. I highly suggest to anyone. Plastic may feel little cheap to you but it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to meal prep. The shaker is quality and handy. The pill dispenser is a nice added touch. Quality food containers and the lunch box itself is made very well. I have used it for 2 weeks so far. Zippers and outerwear are holding up despite high traffic and some abuse. The insulation is excellent. I use the ice pack and it sits out all day on 72F. My food is still refrigerator chilled 8-10 hours later. Great for medical personnel (I’m a surgical resident).
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ruebhausen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect meal prep lunch box
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my fiance for his birthday and he ABSOLUTELY loved it! He was amazed to see all the extra items ThinkFit included in the lunch box, and the quality of ALL items included. I definitely plan to buy from ThinkFit again... I have to get one for myself! It includes 6 small containers for perfectly portioned meals/snacks, or fits room for 3-4 larger containers that I would normally buy. Great buy, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Helps with menu planning
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter bought this for her boyfriend to take his lunch she makes for him everyday. They both love it. Keeps fruits, meals and drink in one convenient place. He no longer takes plastic bags. Durable and excellent containers for meals.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C. Islam

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Been using for 3 Months and has been great. I do not use the tupperware. I got bigger ones. The ice oack and pill box are holding up great. Only criticism is the side pouch ripped a little with my shaker bottle going in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: shaker cup is better than most on the market (it's smaller
customer_reviews.text: I use this every morning. The pill case is convenient for vitamins, shaker cup is better than most on the market (it's smaller, but makes it for it with a plastic separator/blender inside to breakdown whatever you you may be shaking up in it), the outside of the lunchbox is sturdy (I've tossed it around a few times and it has no tears, scratches, etc, the food containers are air tight and have survived multiple dishwashing cycles with steam. This is definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Darion

customer_reviews.title: Just not a Fan
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay cold for as long as listed. When I added more cold inserts still didn't hold. I had around 4 to 5 hours of cold food. I work a 12 hour shift and needed something to hold for 8 to 10 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Warning False Advertisement!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this lunch bag specifically for the pill dispenser and shaker and I am completely missing the metal separator to the mixer and the pill dispenser not cool! Also my cup was pretty dirty and I have a feeling they gave me a refurbished product but charged me for a new one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin&Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Portion sizes are great! I poured water in it to test for leak proof and it also worked very well. To clean I just took a washcloth and wiped it right out! I highly recommend this lunchbox! The ice packs stayed frozen all day sitting in my car, and it was 76 outside!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, keeps food cool
customer_reviews.text: The lunch box is very spacious, looks great, but my only issue is that it doesn't keep food super cold. I even put 2 extra ice packs in there with the one that came with it, food definitely stays cool enough for 6-8 hours, however it doesn't stay super cold. So over long periods of time be careful with your food.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Kaveh

customer_reviews.title: Has everything you need
customer_reviews.text: At first when I saw the size of the bag, I thought the portion control containers would be small. However, there are 6 portion control containers, with 4 of them being a good size and 2 of them being smaller. I was able to fit 4 meals, 2 snacks, 2 ice packs and also a bottle of ranch inside the main part of the bag. Also the shaker cup is awesome as it allows you to separate your protein from the liquid of choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed in this lunch box
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed in this lunch box. Bought it for my son for high school and he's been carrying it less than a month and the handle is torn where it's sewn to the lunchbox!! Unbelievable considering I paid $40 for this a month ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1.5mos in and ice pack is leaking
customer_reviews.text: i've had this bag for a little over a month now. it serves it's purpose quite well. i've run into 1 issue already and that's the ice pack. it's leaking already and i'm not rough with it. at all. but the rest of the bag is holding up very well so far. i bought some prep naturals pyrex containers to go with it bc i don't like plastic and they fit nicely inside the bag.
customer_reviews.author: APRJTI

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband so he can take his snacks and lunch with him to work. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Lunch box
customer_reviews.text: Ok I've put these through hell and it's only faded a little I work construction so half of this time it sits by the road for at least 4 hours a day Great durable product, a little pricey but the quality is worth it
customer_reviews.author: Angel V.

customer_reviews.title: Simply Perfect
customer_reviews.text: They thought of everything. From the enclosed single serving storage containers to the ice pack, to the pill planner and multi purpose thermos/shaker blender. Literally everything you could want and many things you didnt know you could want. And it's all in a perfectly sized, great looking lunch box.
customer_reviews.author: Nightshift

customer_reviews.title: Good product, better customer service
customer_reviews.text: The item was smaller than anticipated, but stores a surprising amount of food. I didn't even open three of the containers for the first few weeks of using this as my lunch box everyday. It's great for meal prepping several small meals throughout your workday. The included ice pack started leaking after not much use, but the company sent me a new one immediately when requested, and no problems since. I did just crack a food container, and was disappointed to see that I had to order a pack of 6 for replacement rather than just one or two, but I have no doubt if I emailed the company they'd accommodate my request.
customer_reviews.author: Karin M. Jenks

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean but very cheaply made. The freezer packs bulged out the first time using them now they don’t fit easily. Mine came with a small hole on the inside of it. Containers are a little to shallow, would be better if they were taller and less lengthy. Pill dispenser jams up constantly. Shaker spring doesn’t work to well. Overall not the best product.
customer_reviews.author: Westwood

customer_reviews.title: Great Lunch Box
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for my step dad. He loves it. He takes his lunch with him every day to work and he says he its great. He also loved all the extras that came with it. Great purchase! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Take your time and do a little bit more And do a little bit more reviewing.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is nice just the quality of the material is cheap. The cup also had plastic shaving end it when opening the metal wiring inside I found to be annoying.

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Everything came in on time. It's a Christmas gift so I have not used it at all but its everything the person wanted! I can't wait to see their face this.by far was the most for the money and the best.
customer_reviews.author: Jamieh0162

customer_reviews.title: All-In-One, and you're done! Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Awesome! Awesome! Excellent presentation! If you are trying to control portion size, and, or are a meal prepper, this is an amazing value. You get everything you need in an attractive package. I would absolutely buy this item again, and have already recommended it to many of my friends, and family!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. X-Rated

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic accessories
customer_reviews.text: I finally decided to a new lunch box after my original one of 2 years was literally falling apart. I wanted one that would last much longer than it did and looked aesthetic to boot. This lunch box seemed to fit the bill, and it the fact it came with so many accessories was a bonus. This is clearly fitness-oriented and I love that. It's held up well so far and I hope it continues to for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Zavage

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the working husband.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, as his lunchbox was almost 10 years old. It took him a little to get used to the side-opening pocket, but has now fallen in love with it. It makes it easier for him while driving to have it in the passenger seat and be able to see everything. I can not think of a single complaint. He loves the new shake bottle: it's much quieter and more effective than the cheap ones with a ball. Montana winter doesn't allow for much use of the ice pack yet.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing cooler. Perfect for meal prep
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing cooler. Perfect for meal prep, comes with everything you would need (minus silverwear). As soon as my husband opened it, we noticed the shaker was missing the attachments. I messaged the seller and they responded right away saying that they would send a replacement and apologized. This bag is really worth the price for all it comes with it. If you’re someone who love meal prepping, or just takes your lunch on the go. It’s nice having a container for everything. The cooler also fits neatly inside of my fridge so it’s a nice size.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: The build quality of this thing is amazing! Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: The build quality of this thing is amazing! Very impressed. The size is perfect, not too big, not too small. Exactly what I was looking for, and at a great price point. Definitely recommended. I picked up some different containers, ones from freshware with 3 compartments. Can't complain about the ones that came with it, but they're a little small for what I'm looking for. Overall, 5/5 product.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoJones

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lunchbox. It’s nice for meal prepping. However the containers are not microwave safe. The size is nice but could be small for people who are looking to take multiple meals.
customer_reviews.author: TheFahFamily

customer_reviews.title: Great lunchbox for meal prepping on the go.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the thinkfit lunchbox for a few weeks now and I absolutely love it. I’m at school for 12 hours straight on mondays so I was looking for a lunchbox that could hold multiple meals and keep them fresh all day long. I did need to use an extra ice pack but that’s just for my own preference of having really cold food.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Seiberlich

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch box
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lunch box. The shaker bottle and storage containers work well. I'd like to see the lunch box a little larger and the same for the containers. I pack 3 meals in this bag, but when I'm on a bulking diet, there just isn't enough room.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag for meal preps!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lunch bag for meal prepping at work. Buy the gel warmers to keep your food warm for about 4 hours. The cup it comes with is really neat. It has everything you need to keep snake or your workout powers in it. The rotating pill dial is awesome to keep you on track while you are away from home. I recommend this bad to anyone wanting to keep their meal plans good during work.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far. It’s been 2 weeks of ise the small bowls make it great for portion controls so I am happy with it. Everything came in the box in good condition. Ice packs help a lot to keep food cold until heating hope ot keeps on working. I’m happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice 2 meal prep bag
customer_reviews.text: Decent bag for 2 meal preps zippers have held up and holds a decent cool. I usually only have food in for a few hours but has worked great. Just wish I had a bigger bag so if you want to prep more than 2 meals you may want a larger bag. Over all very happy with it. Containers that came with it weren’t large enough.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with ThinkFit! I received the bag without its bottle shaker and reached out to the company and they shipped me one in less than 48 hours. I highly recommend their products. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Neshia

customer_reviews.title: Must have for athletes and those needing meal prep!
customer_reviews.text: Man I can’t imagine cutting weight without this. I’m a professional fighter and meal prep is a must! My first one caught fire when it touched a hot candle on the outside so I bought a second. Careful they’re pretty flammable but besides that it’s amaizng !
customer_reviews.author: Julianajitsu

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaker bottle included!
customer_reviews.text: I Love the shaker bottle the most out of everything! The shaker bottle will break protein powder better than any other shaker I've owned, it puts blender bottles to shame. The lunch bag is nice though it lacks mid support if you have a descent amount of food in the bag. Containers are nice and solid. The ice pack last me for 8+ hours
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Only one complaint
customer_reviews.text: I love everything that comes with this product. Tons of containers at perfect sizes considering the price. I wish that this came with a second ice pack. My food was a little to warm one day after a few hours, but on a colder day, one ice pack lasted me all day. The containers are also perfect sizes for each little meal.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Niebloom

customer_reviews.title: Great product Blender bottle needs work
customer_reviews.text: The lunch box and containers are awesome good space and great portion sizes! Only issue I have is with the blender bottle. The lids don't fit right and they constantly leak when I try to take a drink out our it. The top is on right and everything but somehow it still manages to leak.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua King

product_meta.title: ThinkFit Insulated Meal Prep Lunch Box with 6 Food Portion Control Containers - BPA-Free, Reusable, Microwavable, Freezer Safe - With Shaker Cup, Pill Organizer, Shoulder Strap & Storage Pocket (Blue)
feature_bullets: BEST MEAL PREP LUNCH BAG: ThinkFit lunch boxes include 6 meal prep containers, a pill dispenser, shaker cup & 2 LARGE reusable ice packs. Popular with men and women who have active lifestyles, daily gym routines, hectic work schedules or body build.
6 PORTION CONTROL FOOD CONTAINERS: Each portion container has lids that tightly seal for the freshest food and taste possible. Sizes come in small (1.5 cups) and medium (2.5 cups).
REUSABLE, MICROWAVE & FREEZER SAFE: Made with durable, heavy duty BPA-Free plastic. Our reusable lunch box with containers are microwavable, freezable and dishwasher safe.
DOUBLE INSULATION TO KEEP MEALS HOT OR COLD: Our tactical lunch box has 3 compartments on each side. Pack your breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks and salads. Now with 2 XL ice packs to keep food safe.
100% LIFETIME GUARANTEE: All thermal meal prep bags and meal containers are guaranteed. Not happy or need a replacement? Contact us for immediate help. We will refund or replace, no questions asked.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars4,186 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
